actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.
Reported to House from the Joint Committee on Atomic Energy with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1079.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #254 (356-5).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3107 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Joint Committee on Atomic Energy with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1079) Authorizes the appropriation of $274,300,000 to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) for salaries and expenses, until expended. Authorizes the transfer of funds between agencies of the Government for the performance of related functions. Provides under Public Law 94-79, the NRC Authorization Act, that moneys received by the NRC for the cooperative nuclear research program may be retained and used for salaries and expenses associated with that program.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended.
